languages.text: "Я дрожу от ярости, вспоминая, что этот еретик посягал на святой Патент! День, когда мы предадим его смерти, будет моим личным праздником".
"I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."
languages.original_text: "Я дрожу от ярости, вспоминая, что этот еретик посягал на святой Патент! День, когда мы предадим его смерти, будет моим личным праздником".

traits.locale_text: "I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “一想到那个异端分子曾打算染指神圣的授状，我就气得浑身发抖！对我而言，我们把他绳之以法的那天一定会成为大喜的日子。”
languages.original_text: "I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."

traits.locale_text: “一想到那个异端分子曾打算染指神圣的许可证，我就气得浑身发抖！对我而言，我们把他绳之以法的那天一定会成为大喜的日子。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je tremble de rage chaque fois que je repense à la manière dont il a voulu empiéter sur la lettre de marque ! Le jour de son exécution sera à marquer d'une croix rouge. »
languages.original_text: "I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."

traits.locale_text: « Je tremble de rage chaque fois que je repense à la manière dont il a voulu empiéter sur la lettre de marque ! Le jour de son exécution sera à marquer d'une croix rouge. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Tiemblo de ira al pensar que ese hereje quiso apropiarse de la sagrada Patente! El día que lo matemos será motivo de júbilo para mí».
languages.original_text: "I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."

traits.locale_text: «¡Tiemblo de ira al pensar que ese hereje quiso apropiarse de la sagrada Patente! El día que lo matemos será motivo de júbilo para mí».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「この異端が神聖令状を侵そうとしていたことを思い出すと、怒りで身体が震える！奴に死を与える日が、私の記念日となるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."

traits.locale_text: 「この異端が神聖令状を侵そうとしていたことを思い出すと、怒りで身体が震える！奴に死を与える日が、私の記念日となるだろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich zittere vor Wut, wenn ich daran denke, dass dieser Ketzer den heiligen Handelsbrief entweihen wollte! Der Tag, an dem wir ihn töten, wird für mich ein Festtag."
languages.original_text: "I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich zittere vor Wut, wenn ich daran denke, dass dieser Ketzer den heiligen Handelsbrief entweihen wollte! Der Tag, an dem wir ihn töten, wird für mich ein Festtag."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."

languages.text: "O kâfirin Kutsal Ruhsatname'yi çiğnemeye çalıştığını hatırladıkça öfkeden kuduruyorum! Canını aldığımız gün yüreğim rahata erecek."
languages.original_text: "I tremble with rage to remember that this heretic sought to encroach upon the Sacred Warrant! The day we put him to death will be a red letter day for me."
